commit message: Require a selection on step 2 before user can continue to next step.
Add a 'Share Chrome app' button. Allows for user to easily send zip.
Add Progress Dialogs. Run some tasks in background threads.
Generate app installed list in background.
Back button on device now prompts user if they want to restart the wizard.
Clean up directories that are not needed after app runs.
Add progress dialog when packaging Chrome app.
Bump version number and remove unnecessary dependency.
Run media scanner. Makes sure new files appear when connected to PC.
UI Improvements. Tinted status bar and MaterialDialog popups.
Remove library. It is pulled from JCenter.
use jars from maven central ( through jcenter ) - no more jars in libs - this is a preparation to get this nice app on fdroid
Theme Changes. Rename app to 'ARChon Packager'

Merge pull request #2 from ligi/prepare_fdroid

prepare fdroid release - use jars from maven central
Force portrait mode. Enable hardware acceleration.
AsyncTask for 'Select an APK from phone's storage'
